# cancelExport()

**Instance Method**

Cancels the execution of an export session.

## Declaration

```swift
func cancelExport()
```

## Discussion

Apple discourages the use of this symbol. Use [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Task/cancel()] on the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Task] or parent task that initiated the export instead.

## Exporting media

- **export(to:as:isolation:)**: Exports the asset to the output location in the specified file type.
- **exportAsynchronously(completionHandler:)**: Starts the asynchronous execution of an export session.
